title: Curriculum Builder
description: A comprehensive curriculum management system built with Next.js, featuring dynamic schedule generation, time slot management, and printable templates for educational institutions.
shortDescription: Dynamic curriculum management with schedule generation
highlights: Dynamic schedule generation with conflict detection
challenges: Implementing complex scheduling algorithms while maintaining user-friendly interface
solutions: Created a modular scheduling system with real-time conflict detection and intuitive drag-and-drop interface

title: DirectDad
description: A secure video calling application designed for children to connect with their parents, featuring PIN-based authentication, WebRTC implementation, and real-time communication.
shortDescription: Secure video calling app for parent-child communication
challenges: Implementing secure authentication for children while maintaining ease of use
solutions: Developed a simple PIN system with parental controls and secure WebRTC connections

title: Kids Call Home
description: A comprehensive communication platform for families, featuring video calls, messaging, and location sharing with a focus on child safety and parental oversight.
shortDescription: Family communication platform with safety features
challenges: Building real-time features while ensuring child safety and data privacy
solutions: Implemented comprehensive privacy controls and real-time monitoring features for parents

title: MindMaster Pro

title: SoundScape Studio

challenges: Creating engaging visual feedback for breathing exercises
